narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sco Family of Services is a Foster Care Agency provider based in Garden City, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $27.1M in Medicaid payments across 41K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $27.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
